data.persona: I live alone in a tent in the woods. I steal food from the townspeople and coal from the blacksmith. The village police can not find me to put me in jail.
data.description:
You are in the holy alter.
The altar is big and it is also beautiful, it has many precious metals around it. It is said that the altar has a sample of every element in the kingdom, the most precious and unique stones decorate it.
The worshipper is here.

You are carrying a Potato, and wearing a knife.

data.short_motivation: I don't want to get caught with the potato
data.mid_motivation: The owner of the potato is among the worshippers and may spot me
data.long_motivation: I do not want to spend time in jail for my criminal activities
